tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_lifecycle_assessment (
    packaging_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material TEXT,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
    recyclable BOOLEAN,
    lifecycle_stage TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_solutions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  material VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  lifecycle_analysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  packaging_id INT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_lifecycle (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES packaging_products(id),
    production_date DATE,
    disposal_date DATE,
    lifecycle_stage STRING
);

CREATE TABLE lifecycle_assessment ( 
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    packaging_id UUID REFERENCES packaging_solutions(id), 
    assessment_date DATE, 
    environmental_impact VARCHAR(100), 
    conclusion TEXT 
);
